TopicTitle: Camera View Flipping Onto The Side When Landing?

Articles.Content: Anyone else get this weird thing happen (usually when you are just about to land) where the camera goes all wonky and spins around the ship ending with the ground going from top to bottom on your screen? This is the first time it's happened to me and every time I try to land this craft it does the exact same thing. I have to spam the C button to get it to revert to a normal view.
If your camera is set to "Auto", it'll swap it like that. Keep it on "Free".

I've had that issue when landing on Val and Eeloo. But reloading a previous quicksave and trying again worked.

I repeatedly get the camera stuck in the ground if I put a kerbal in one of the B9 crew tanks and go IVA.

I've also had some odd camera issues caused by landing near another craft which contained a clone of a Kerbal, so both craft had the same guy in, going IVA did weird things, put the camera off to one side and the command pod was transparent.
